name: MÁNATIND: LEGEND OF ROCKET KNIGHT
description:
~~~Welcome to Mánatind, the Mountain of dreams!~~~

This place is a treasure trove of climbing spots!

And it is also the home of the most challenging route of all,

the one only the ROCKET KNIGHT has conquered.

~~~

In this DEMO version you will be able to play around in a level specifically created for the demo. There is one flag/goal if you want to race for time, a few secret and challenging alternative routes, and a hidden secret!

In the final version, there will be multiple goals and routes to explore, as well as the infamous route mentioned up above. It will also feature online leaderboards (currently only a locally saved high score table), and map editing/sharing.

At least, those are my stretch goals, it all depends on what kind of feedback I get and interest, so if you want this game to become even better, please, at the very, tell me you like it so I know someone does! It will mean a lot to me. <3

Also let me know if you manage to beat my high score!:O

Good luck and have fun!
